action.action-desc: Mr. Cawthorn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to ensure that the number of members of the Armed Forces who are deployed by reason of the situation in Ukraine does not exceed the number of members of the Armed Forces who are deployed to the Southern Border of the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ukraine and Southern Border Act or the USB Act.

section.header: Deployment of at least equal numbers of members of the Armed Forces to Southern Border of United States as by reason of situation in Ukraine
section.text: The Secretary of Defense shall ensure that the number of members of the Armed Forces who are deployed by reason of the situation in Ukraine does not exceed the number of members of the Armed Forces who are deployed to the Southern Border of the United States.
